edu.teddys.network
Interface NetworkCommunicatorAPI

All Known Implementing Classes:
NetworkCommunicatorSpidermonkeyClient, NetworkCommunicatorSpidermonkeyServer, TeddyClient, TeddyServer
public interface NetworkCommunicatorAPI

The Application Programming Interface for the client/server communication.

 

Method Summary
 void disconnect(java.lang.Integer clientID)
          Destroy the active session for the specified user.
 java.lang.String getPubKey(java.lang.String pubKeyClient)
          Get the public key from the server for encryption reasons.
 boolean join()
          Join a new client to the list of users.
 void send(NetworkMessage message)
          Send messages to the server.
 

Method Detail

getPubKey

java.lang.String getPubKey(java.lang.String pubKeyClient)
Get the public key from the server for encryption reasons.

Parameters:
pubKeyClient - The key from the client so that the public key from the server can be encrypted.
Returns:
The public server key

send

void send(NetworkMessage message)
Send messages to the server. Depending on the type of the message, other clients are notified.

Parameters:
message - Some NetworkMessage

join

boolean join()
Join a new client to the list of users.

Returns:
Response from the server if the session could be opened or not.

disconnect

void disconnect(java.lang.Integer clientID)
Destroy the active session for the specified user.

Parameters:
client - The client ID for the client to be disconnected. (Server implementation)
